pullRequest.title: JENA-1881: Add being able to read variations of RDF* JSON syntax.
pullRequest.bodyText:
The JSON result form changes are not defined in RDF* so there are variations.
This PR adds being about to read RDF4J variation of JSON results.
Also some cleanups that got noticed.

commit.message: Cleanup; make DatasetGraphMap follow the example in TransactionalLock
JENA-1881: Add compatible with other forms of RDF* JSON results

beforeCommit.message: JENA-1881: Add compatible with other forms of RDF* JSON results

afterCommit.message: JENA-1881: Add compatible with other forms of RDF* JSON results
